data.meta_description: October is #DyslexiaAwarenessMonth. As such, IG will be matching up to $50,000 in donations throughout the entire month. Click here to donate‚Ä¶
data.text:
Join us on Oct. 28 @ 8pm ET as we look forward to laughing with you virtually during our National Virtual Improv Comedy Event. Canadian actors and comedians, and husband and wife, Colin Mochrie (Whose Line Is It Anyway?) and Debra McGrath (Little Mosque on the Prairie) will draw from their 27 years of marriage and 60 years of performing around the world to show that humour and joy can be found even in what may seem to be our most challenging days. Combining heart-warming and hilarious stories, along with their charm and wit, Colin and Deb will be sure to provide you with a great evening of entertainment through live improv. Send me a direct message for the event registration link.

Any time that you embark on a real estate transaction, you need to think ‚Äúwhat does this mean for my tax return?‚Äù says Mariska Loeppky, Director Tax & Estate Planning with IG. Mariska joins BNN Bloomberg to share her top real estate advice for Canadiansüè°üè¢. http://ow.ly/JlpC102pcTk

Join us Oct 22 for a discussion with human rights legend Martin Luther King III. Mr. King is famous for his global efforts to ensure racial justice and equality and will be interviewed by IG Wealth Management‚Äôs CEO, Damon Murchison. Topics will include his iconic family history, his work around the globe with key political figures and the need for seeking peaceful means to achieve our goal. IG Wealth Management is proud to be making a donation to Black North Initiative through this incredible event. Please send me a private message for the registration link!
